scripts.dev: set DEBUG=app:*&& set NODE_ENV=development && nodemon index

scripts.mocksKeys: set DEBUG=app:*&& set NODE_ENV=development && node scripts/mongo/seedApiKeys
scripts.mocksUsers: set DEBUG=app:*&& set NODE_ENV=development && node scripts/mongo/seedUsers.js
